#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,avg,n,i,a[1000];
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {   avg=0;
        cin>>n;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cin>>a[i];
            if(a[i]>avg)
            {
                avg=a[i];
            }
        }
        cout<<avg<<endl;
    }
}
